channel.title: office equipment on Logotyp.us
channel.description: Recent content in office equipment on Logotyp.us

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
Ricoh Logo
The Ricoh Company, Ltd. is a Japanese multinational imaging and electronics company. It was founded by the now-defunct commercial division of the Institute of Physical and Chemical Research known as the Riken Concern, on 6 February 1936 as Riken Sensitized Paper. Ricoh’s headquarters are located in Ota, Tokyo. Ricoh produces electronic products, primarily cameras and office equipment such as printers, photocopiers, fax machines, offers Software as a Service document management applications such as DocumentMall, RicohDocs, GlobalScan, Print&Share and also offers Projectors.
You can download theRicohlogo on full-version of the page.
]] >
item.title: Ricoh
item.description: The Ricoh Company, Ltd. is a Japanese multinational imaging and electronics company. It was founded by the now-defunct commercial division of the Institute of Physical and Chemical Research known as the Riken Concern, on 6 February 1936 as Riken Sensitized Paper. Ricoh’s headquarters are located in Ota, Tokyo. Ricoh produces electronic products, primarily cameras and office equipment such as printers, photocopiers, fax machines, offers Software as a Service document management applications such as DocumentMall, RicohDocs, GlobalScan, Print&Share and also offers Projectors.
